action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Energy Sector Innovation Credit Act of 2018
This bill allows investment and production tax credits for electricity-generating facilities that use new or improved technologies that meet specified requirements. The bill also allows a credit for investments in certain retrofits that improve efficiency; decrease water consumption; or reduce, sequester, or control air pollution at existing electricity-generating facilities.
